name: CosPuzzle
description:
CosPuzzle: Giu Hellsing is a game for cosplay lovers, you can play a nice game and be rewarded with photos of a cosplayer with different clothes.

Features:

  • 16 Levels
  • 15 Cards (Soon)
  • 100 Achievements
  • Some exclusive photos
  • 2 Play Styles, Jigsaw (Mouse only and set for default) or Sliding (keyboard or joysticks)
  • Level finish shortcut (Press F to pay respects)
  • Play with keyboard only, mouse or controller.
